d to Flight Plan Alternative Airport records through the `` element. * Average Wind Component and Route Distance details are assigned to Flight Plan Alternative Airport records through the `` element. * Cumulated Burn Off Fuel details are assigned to Flight Plan Alternative Airport records through the `` element. * Alternate Fuel, Alternate Fuel Time Equivalance, Final Reserve Fuel and Final Reserve Fuel Time Equivalance details are assigned to Flight Plan Alternative Airport records through the `` element. * When Unique Key is null, `status`(see Mapping for details) of the associated Flight Plan Alternative Airports' records are updated as "CANCELLED" for corresponding `legId`. #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: A composite key, combining `legId`, `stationIataCode` and `type` fields. * Insert and update operations are carried out using Unique Key. * No delete operation is performed, as the source system does not delete Flight Plan Alternative Airport records. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source File|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | | |legId| | |Data Handling Operation| |type| | |

  • The field is set to one of the following value:

    • “Alternative Departure Airport”

    • “EFB Alternative Arrival Airport”

    • “Enroute Alternative Airport”

    • “Primary Alternative Arrival Airport”

    • “Alternative Arrival Airport”
